HomePage.info-04-: With a team of highly skilled professionals with extensive experience in their respective fields across all our branches in Saudi Arabia, Egypt, and Malaysia, we specialize in mobile and smartphone application design using the latest programming technologies. This helps us achieve our goals and earn the trust of our clients. Mahr Bin Naif has a large team, each with their own unique specialization, making us one of the best companies for mobile app and website design in Saudi Arabia. We also offer audiovisual production services, including photography and directing all types of artistic works. Additionally, we conduct business activity studies and create comprehensive marketing plans. At Mahr Bin Naif, we have eight years of experience in providing these services, and our top priority is customer satisfaction with the services we offer

HomePage.details-07: Creating an application and a website
HomePage.details-08: Studies have shown that 60% of internet users browse through mobile devices, compared to 40% who use computers. Additionally, there is a confirmed study indicating that the total e-commerce in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has reached 70 billion Saudi riyals, with 50% of this commerce conducted through mobile applications. Based on the above, it is imperative for businesses to obtain a mobile application containing the business name, products or services, and facilitating quick communication with customers. At MBN, we specialize in developing mobile applications and websites to the highest standards. Our mobile app design company offers top-notch features and the best deals.
HomePage.details-09: Why do you choose this service ?
HomePage.details-010: Designing an e-commerce store is a crucial step to increase your profits through online trading and selling over the internet. Store design encompasses all the tools that help you showcase your company's products and initiate the selling process. MBN is one of the best companies in designing e-commerce stores, where we provide you with an integrated store that offers you unique and innovative solutions, making it easy for you to manage the selling process effortlessly. The design comes with a user-friendly interface and all the e-commerce tools that help increase sales traffic. Not only that, but we understand that you want to market your store online, so we ensure that during the store design process, it is compatible with search engines, optimizing the design to be Google-friendly, enhancing your store's ranking to achieve top results on Google. Additionally, we provide all e-marketing consultations for free. MBN is one of the best e-commerce store design companies, guaranteeing that all payment methods are 100% secure, ensuring the safety of the sales process. We also provide innovative solutions for printing invoices after purchase or sending them via mobile message, along with clarifying all the banking procedures that have been carried out.
HomePage.details-012: Expand your business by implementing a marketing plan provided for free by MBN. We nominate celebrities and active social media accounts that suit your business, providing their names, viewership statistics, and discounted rates due to MBN's relationship with the brightest names in social media. You can now request the service by specifying the advertising capital allocated. This ensures accurate study presentation. As you know, dear merchant, advertisers are abundant, some charging exorbitant fees, while others offer reasonable rates. Based on the allocated capital, we provide an advertising plan that suits your budget.
HomePage.details-014: The Maher Bin Naif Group's technical team provides various video production services for establishments, government and private sectors, and individuals. These services include video and photo shooting, audio recording and engineering, design, motion graphics and animations, event and occasion coverage, as well as the creation of TV programs, series, YouTube content, and social media projects.
